label: Tyres and Wheels
description: Market category for tyres and wheels for various types of vehicles.
intents: Find and purchase tyres and wheels for my vehicle.
Get information on different types of tyres and wheels.
Find a local tyre and wheel shop for installation and repair services.

subcategories.label: Alloy Wheels
subcategories.description: Wheels made of aluminum or magnesium alloy.

subcategories.label: Truck and SUV Tyres
subcategories.description: Tyres specifically designed for trucks and SUVs.

subcategories.label: Wheel Repair and Refurbishment
subcategories.description: Services for repairing and refurbishing damaged or worn wheels.
